title: Game is crashing in game
body:
Good night, my game keeps crashing in game in random situations, such come to base click on a item and bum crash, can t even ctrl+alt+del, crashes my pc, happened 3 times today, didnt change anything in my pc, the strange thing is that sound continues to run, i dont know what to do, i full repair the game and continues the problem, really need help or else i cant play.
Other thing that happened to me is when i open 1 chest the animation run but no items. Need Help please :s
(sorry for my bad english)

replies.body:
Good evening, friend!  Sorry to hear about that crashes, and I'd like to help with some more info.  When you say crash, are you getting any error messages?  A bugsplat?  Does it happen at any specific point in the match?

Regarding your chest, I took a look into this for you and it looks like you unlocked a Summoner Icon (Kuro).  These automatically unlock without spending essences, and is available in your inventory.

Let me know!

First of all, i will put my pc info
i7 6700 
nvidea 1060m
16gb 
game installation on SSD

About the chest im clear, thank you.
No i dont get any messages, for example, 40 mins ago +/-, i turn on my pc, and started a normal game, when the loading stop and champions appear the game crashed, i just opened the buy thing to buy an item and it crashed, the sound continues, and i continues to have chat in my client  (my friend ask for me not coming), i waited and nothinh happened, tried ctrl+alt+del but the pc dont let me open task , and this happen to me 3 times today. Another example, in a middle of a game i went to base to buy and happened, i just restarted my pc and the game reconnect and continues to run normaly.
As i said before i dont know what to do, this never happened me before 7.9 patch

Thanks you for all of this amazing info, it helped a lot!  The really interesting piece here is that you can still hear sounds while playing.  That must mean you're still connected to the match but a hardware or driver issue stopped responding so nothing is coming up.  Go over the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot this, making sure to go over each step to rule out possibilities.  Test this in a custom game to prevent any penalties!  Hope it helps!

But it just happen with this game, i played all days without problems, my graphics card driver are with the most stable version, the rest of the drivers are up to date, yesterday was all fine, today this :s 3 times, cant play and i didnt change a thing on my pc, dont understand this, the mouse keeps running, the sound too, but the gameplay doenst
I am having the same problem. I am fighting the support team right now. They keep saying its "overheating"
